code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Form,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBox=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState("");const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(keyword.trim()){navigate("https://gg-6702.onrender.com/search/".concat(keyword));}else{navigate("/");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:submitHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",name:"q",value:keyword,onChange:e=>setKeyword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Search Products...",className:"mr-sm-2 ml-sm-5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"outline-success",className:"p-2",children:"Search"})]});};export default SearchBox;
